text: The 2017 Men's Junior Pan-American Volleyball Cup was the third edition of the bi-annual men's volleyball tournament. Seven teams participated in this edition held in Fort McMurray.2017 Pan-American Cup U21 COMPETITION REGULATIONS, NORCECA ==Competing nations== {| class="wikitable" !width=33%|Group A !width=33%|Group B |- | | Canada |} ==Competition format== * Seven teams will be divided into two pools. In the group stage each pool will play round robin. * The first rank teams of each pool after group stage will receive byes into the semifinals. * The second and third rank teams in each pool will play in the quarterfinals. ==Preliminary round== *All times are in Canada Standard Time (UTC−06:00) {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background:#ccffcc;"| |Team advances to semifinals |- | style="background:#dfefff;"| |Team advances to quarterfinals |} ===Group A=== |} |} ===Group B=== |} |} == Final round == ===Championship bracket=== ===Quarterfinals=== |} ===5th place match=== |} ===Semifinals=== |} ===6th place match=== |} ===3rd place match=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=40|Rank!!width=180|Team |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| Canada |- align=center |4 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |5 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |7 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |} {|class="wikitable" |bgcolor=#ccffcc|||Qualified for FIVB U21 World Championship |} ==Individual awards== *Most Valuable Player ** *Best Scorer ** *Best Setter ** *Best Opposite ** *Best Outside Hitters ** ** *Best Middle Blockers ** ** *Best Libero ** *Best Server ** *Best Receiver ** *Best Digger ** ==References== ==External links== Category:Men's Pan-American Volleyball Cup Pan-American Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Canada Category:2017 in Canadian sports Category:May 2017 sports events in Canada
title: 2017 Men's Junior Pan-American Volleyball Cup
